title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - Facebook Ads Setup (cats.center)
description:
Set up and launch Facebook/Instagram paid advertising campaign for cats.center.

## Budget
- Total: $400
- Daily: $20/day
- Duration: 20 days

## Ad Sets
1. **New Cat Owner** - Target: Recent pet adopters, 22-45
2. **Cat Health Concern** - Target: Cat health interests
3. **Breed Research** - Target: Cat breeds, pet adoption interests

## Creative Assets Required
- 3 images (cute cats, curious cats, multiple breeds)
- Headlines and copy per ad set (see /tmp/traffic_bootstrap)

## Targeting
- Age: 22-50
- Interests: Cats, Cat food brands, Pet adoption, Kittens
- Exclude: Pet industry employees

## Success Metrics
- Target CAC: < $0.80
- Target signups: 500+
- Target CTR: > 1%
acceptance_criteria: 3 ad sets created with proper targeting
testing_plan:
1. Verify Pixel firing on cats.center
2. Confirm ads approved (no policy violations)
3. Check first 24 hours: CTR > 0.5%, CPC < $1
4. Day 3 review: Pause underperformers, scale winners
rollback_plan: Pause campaign if CAC exceeds $2 after 72 hours
